linktoarchive-onion-link: Tooltip shown when hovering over an onion link icon. Onion links are Tor network addresses.
linktoarchive-onion-icon-alt: Alt text for the onion icon image. Used for accessibility purposes.
linktoarchive-archive-link: Tooltip shown when hovering over a web.archive.org link icon.
linktoarchive-archive-icon-alt: Alt text for the archive.org icon image. Used for accessibility purposes.
linktoarchive-archivetoday-link: Tooltip shown when hovering over an archive.today link icon.
linktoarchive-archivetoday-icon-alt: Alt text for the archive.today icon image. Used for accessibility purposes.
linktoarchive-archive-link-desc: Tooltip shown when hovering over a web.archive.org link that points to an archived version of a normal URL.
linktoarchive-archivetoday-link-desc: Tooltip shown when hovering over an archive.today link that points to an archived version of a normal URL.
linktoarchive-archive-label: Text label for archive links. This might be shown as text in some contexts.
